sentences.English: I can hardly wait for the summer.
sentences.Japanese: 夏が待ち遠しい(ほとんど待てない)。

sentences.English: He hardly ever smiles.
sentences.Japanese: 彼はめったに笑わない.

sentences.English: nearly 100 people
sentences.Japanese: 100人近い人々 (100は超えない)

sentences.English: We very nearly lost our lives.
sentences.Japanese: 私たちはあやうく命を落としかけた。

sentences.English: I am partly to blame.
sentences.Japanese: 私にも一部責任がある.

sentences.English: Jim looks happy, but actually he's sad.
sentences.Japanese: ジムは幸せそうだけど本当は悲しい.

sentences.English: Ken looks younger than he actually is.
sentences.Japanese: ケンは実際より若く見える.

sentences.English: He is indeed a kind person.
sentences.Japanese: 彼は本当に親切な人です。

sentences.English: Indeed, he is young, but he is very smart.
sentences.Japanese: 確かに彼は若いですが､ とても頭がいい

sentences.English: Even Homer sometimes nods.
sentences.Japanese: <ことわざ>弘法にも筆の誤り (ホメロスでさえも時には居眠りする)。

sentences.English: Things became even more difficult.
sentences.Japanese: 事態はさらに難しくなった.

sentences.English: even numbers ( odd numbers)
sentences.Japanese: 偶数(奇数)

sentences.English: white, even teeth
sentences.Japanese: 白くきれいにそろった歯

sentences.English: It cost 10 dollars even.
sentences.Japanese: ちょうど10ドルでした.

sentences.English: Where exactly did you stay in Australia?
sentences.Japanese: オーストラリアの正確にはどこに滞在したのですか.

sentences.English: Exactly. / Not _______.
sentences.Japanese: そのとおりです. / ちょっと違います(そのとおりではないです)。

sentences.English: Prices are gradually increasing.
sentences.Japanese: 物価が徐々に増加している.

sentences.English: Even experts are only human, and therefore mistakes sometimes occur.
sentences.Japanese: 専門家でもただの人間だ。 それゆえ、ミスが時々起きる.

sentences.English: If you can't make it, your mother may go instead.
sentences.Japanese: もしあなたが行けないのなら､君のお母さんが代わりに行ってもよい。

sentences.English: take the stairs instead of the elevator
sentences.Japanese: エレベーターの代わりに階段を使う

sentences.English: We are open until 11 p.m.on weekdays.
sentences.Japanese: 平日は午後11時まで営業しています。

sentences.English: Stay here until I get back.
sentences.Japanese: 私が戻るまでここにいて.

sentences.English: learn another foreign language besides English
sentences.Japanese: 英語以外の (英語に加えて) 外国語を勉強する

sentences.English: It's too late to go out; besides, it's snowing.
sentences.Japanese: 外出するには遅すぎるし, おまけに,雪が降っている。

sentences.English: Everybody was asleep except (for) him.
sentences.Japanese: 彼以外は皆眠っていた。

sentences.English: Except for a dog, the park was empty.
sentences.Japanese: 1匹のイヌを除いて, 公園には誰もいなかった。
